title: RBI move to allow AMC license to IndusInd Bank could open route for para-banking activities by banks
description: Reserve Bank of India's approval for IndusInd Bank to establish a wholly owned asset management company (AMC) could set a precedent for other banks to create similar para-banking subsidiaries. This move follows previous RBI decisions allowing HDFC Bank and ICICI Bank to increase stakes in their insurance subsidiaries.
